items.title: Key Properties of Logarithms
items.content:
1. $\log x + \log y = \log(xy)$
  2. $\log x - \log y = \log(\frac{x}{y})$
  3. $\log x^n = n \log x$
  4. $\log_x x = 1$
  5. $\log_x 1 = 0$

items.title: Change of Base & Inverse
items.content:
• **Base changing property:** $\log_y x = \frac{\log_n x}{\log_n y}$
  • **Multiplicative inverse:** $\log_y x = \frac{1}{\log_x y}$

items.title: Common Logarithm
items.content:
If the base is not mentioned, it is 10.
  • $\log 10 = 1$
  • $\log 100 = 2$
  • $\log 0.1 = -1$
